moves.description: Analyze main chat API endpoint implementation
moves.details: Examine app/api/chat/route.ts for streaming response configuration, headers, and current implementation approach
Analyze chat UI components for real-time update mechanisms and response processing

moves.description: Examine model provider integrations for streaming support
moves.details: Review lib/models/ and lib/providers/ for OpenRouter and other provider streaming implementations

moves.description: Test actual streaming behavior with browser DevTools
moves.details: Perform manual testing with different models and analyze network requests to identify streaming status

moves.description: Analyze middleware and infrastructure effects on streaming
moves.details: Investigate Next.js configuration, middleware, and Docker setup that might affect streaming responses
Measure response times, identify specific performance issues, and document current vs expected behavior
Compile findings into detailed technical assessment with gap analysis and specific recommendations
